quotes.quote: A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: If we were meant to stay in one place, we’d have roots instead of feet.
quotes.author: Rachel Wolchin

quotes.quote: Adventure isn’t hanging on a rope off the side of a mountain. Adventure is an attitude that we must apply to the day to day obstacles in life.
quotes.author: John Amatt

quotes.quote: Wherever you go, go with all your heart.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Until you step into the unknown, you don’t know what you’re made of.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: You can’t control the past, but you can control where you go next.
quotes.author: Kirsten Hubbard

quotes.quote: Life isn’t about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: It is not the mountain we conquer, but ourselves.
quotes.author: Edmund Hillary

quotes.quote: I am not the same, having seen the moon shine on the other side of the world.
quotes.author: Mary Anne Radmacher

quotes.quote: A mind that is stretched by a new experience can never go back to its old dimensions.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.quote: Life is short and the world is wide.
quotes.author: Simon Raven

quotes.quote: Only those who risk going too far can possibly find out how far they can go.
quotes.author: T.S. Eliot

quotes.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt
